# thetalake_tag (Data Source)

Theta Lake Tag Data Source. Retrieves information about a tag.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "thetalake_tag" "example" {
  id = "123"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Tag ID

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Tag Description
- `name` (String) Tag Name
